data.title: Chronological Scores / Soundtracks
data.meta_description: A collection scores and soundtracks whose tracks are organized into chronological order.
data.text:
Recent Updates / Corrections

6/29/24 - Added the La-La Land releases of Top Gun (1986) and Live and Let Die (1973). Added the Isolated Score to Indiana Jones and the Dial of Destiny (2023). Added the Intrada 2024 release to Honey, I Shrunk the Kids (1989) and Something Wicked This Way Comes (1983).

4/22/24 - Corrected a source cue for Shrek.

2/24/24 - Added the Varese 2019 release to Air Force One (1997).

For a complete list of updates and corrections, go here.

Disclosures

I may earn a small commission for my links to any products from this website. See my general disclosure for complete details.

I acknowledge the images used on this site are for informational and illustrative purposes only. All rights to the images belong to their respective copyright holders. Use of these images is considered fair use, and no infringement is intended.
